title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 670.1 - Court sessions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 670.1 - Court sessions

State Regulations
(a) Unless otherwise ordered, the court
will convene at 10 o' clock in the forenoon on Monday, Tuesday, Thursday, and

Friday. (b) Special
sessions of the court may be held at such times and for such purposes as the
court from time to time may direct. (c) When a cause is argued or submitted
with four justices present, it shall, whenever necessary, be deemed submitted
also to any other duly qualified justice unless objection is noted at the time
of argument or submission. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
670.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
